name: Factory World (itch)
description:
This game was developed for my FdA Games Design and Production degree as my final project.

The goal of the game is to create a factory producing lots of different items and earn as much money as possible.

This is an very early prototype of what the game could potentially be in the future and I'm uploading to Itch.io for peer FEEDBACK so leaving a COMMENT on this page of your experience of the game will be very appreciated , be as honest as possible negative feedback about that game could be vital to make the game enjoyable in the future.
